billEvents.eventText: referred to libraries and education technology

title: Requires public libraries to develop and publish a collection management policy
summary: Requires public libraries with collections of more than 100,000 items to develop and publish a collections management policy which shall ensure the integrity of collections by the development of a clear deaccessioning policy which will foster public access and accountability; provides that such policies shall include uniform processes and procedures for deaccessioning or other disposition of any and all materials within the collection.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to library collections management policy
